0: No one cared who I was until I put on the mask.
1: It doesn’t matter who we are, what matters is our plan.
2: Ah you think darkness is your ally? You merely adopted the dark. I was born in it, molded by it.
3: I didn't see the light until I was already a man, by then it was nothing to me but blinding!
4: Speak of the devil and he shall appear.
5: Theatricality and deception, powerful agents to the uninitiated, but we are initiated.
8: Keep calm now is not the time for fear. That comes later.
9: Peace has cost you your strength. Victory has defeated you!
